text.description:
{Scarab of Fortitude}

Reduces damage received by your army from physical attacks by 40%.
text.event: You find a stray cat playing with something and making a lot of noise. Surprised, you find out that the toy was actually a Scarab of Fortitude. You take both the cat and the artifact, taking a proper care of both of them.
text.name: Scarab of Fortitude
